select.sql: SELECT r.id, r.regkood, r.nimetus:: VARCHAR(254), r.parentid, u.id AS user_id FROM ou.userid u INNER JOIN ou.rekv r ON r.id = u.rekvid WHERE kasutaja = $1 AND u.status <> 3 AND r.status <> 3
SELECT r.nimetus AS asutus, u.* FROM ou.userid u INNER JOIN ou.rekv r ON r.id = u.rekvid WHERE ($1 = 0 OR u.id = $1) AND r.status <> 3 ORDER BY u.last_login DESC , u.id DESC;
